[[Image:Beyond Bree 1989 J.R.R. Tolkien: '''Beyond Bree 1989 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''' was published by the [[American Mensa Tolkien Special Interest Group]] and edited by [[Nancy Martsch]]. The calendar contains pen and ink illustrations by eight different artists.
* Stapled to open out to 11 x 16 3/8 inches
